abstract: Australian troops in Vietnam send home their seasons greetings for Christmas, 1969.
description: Christmas greetings to family and friends from Australians serving in Vietnam. It was produced for broadcast on Victorian television in 1969 by the Australian Army Directorate of Public Relations.
